contentHasHeadings.title: Content should use headings for structure
contentHasHeadings.desc: If appropriate, add headings to the page to organize the content

imgHasAlt.title: Images need alternative text
imgHasAlt.desc: Alternative text should be provided for images

imgAltNotFileName.title: Alternative text for images should not be the image filename
imgAltNotFileName.desc: Provide a brief (under 100 characters) description of the image

imgAltTooLong.title: Images alternative text is too long
imgAltTooLong.desc: Alternative text for images should be less than 100 characters

objectHasTextEquivalent.title: Objects should have text equivalents
objectHasTextEquivalent.desc: Objects should text equivalents of their content

obsoleteElement.title: This element is obsolete:
obsoleteElement.desc: This element is no longer valid HTML and should be removed

pElementAsHeader.title: Don't use p tags with bold text as headings for content
pElementAsHeader.desc: Instead, use heading tags to organize dections of a document

tableHeaderHasScope.title: Tables headers need scope
tableHeaderHasScope.desc: Table headers should have a proper scope defined

textHasContrast.title: Text needs appropriate contrast
textHasContrast.desc: Text should have appropriate contrast with its background

videoNeedsCaptions.title: Linked or embedded videos should have captions
videoNeedsCaptions.desc: Any content that is embedded in your page, such as a video, audio recording, or presentation, should have a text equivalent
